about-description-01: Hi, My Name is Luis Cerchiaro. I am a Junior Frontend Developer. I build apps with React, Tailwind CSS and Node JS.
about-description-02: I am proficient in Frontend skills like React.JS, Redux, Redux Tool Kit, Axios, Tailwind and in Backend I enjoy work with PERN stack.
contact-description: I am currently open for a fulltime Frontend Developer role. If you want to discuss about that feel free to email me.
hero-description-00: I am proficient in JavaScript, React.JS and Node.JS
